description: Buri mwana ate uburenganzira bwo kugira izina n’ubwenegihugu.
title: Buri mwana ate uburenganzira bwo kugira izina n’ubwenegihugu.
content: Buri mwana ate uburenganzira bwo kugira izina n’ubwenegihugu. Kwandiki-sha umwana akivuka, bimuha uburenganzira bwo kwiga, kwivuza, kurengerwa n’amategeko no kugira uburenganzira kuri serivisi zihabwa abaturage.
